location.description:
Human-readable location of a token inside source code.

Both `line` and `column` are indexed from 1.

span.description: Span of one node inside source code.

AstMetadata.description: Information about AST and Parser used to compile provided AST

CallStatementNode.description: Call statement, possibly with a condition and iteration: `call <?iteration> <op>(<...args>) <?condition> { <...statements> }`

Both `line` and `column` are indexed from 1.

OutcomeStatementNode.description:
Outcome node, specifying what value to return and whether to terminate the flow immediately:
`return/fail <?condition> <value>`
`map result/error <?condition> <value>`

Both `line` and `column` are indexed from 1.

PrimitiveLiteralNode.description: Primitive literal atom like booleans, strings and numbers.

SetStatementNode.description: Set statement, possibly with a condition: `set <?condition> { <...assignments> }`
